name: Coronavirus Fighter(灭毒战士)
description:
Background-New Corona Virus is coming, it outbreaks in the world,  try your best to contain and defeat the virus  ASAP for the earth.
背景-新冠病毒来袭，在全世界爆发，为了人类，请尽可能控制并击败它。

Control-Only mouse for PC or finger movement for mobile devices.
控制-仅仅鼠标或手指移动在移动设备即可。

Suggestion-Avoid touching virus/bats and get the mask or alcohol(Can not get both at the same time). Mask can hide you from the virus, alcohol can help to kill a lot of virus
建议-避免接触病毒和蝙蝠，获取口罩或酒精(不能同时获取). 口罩能隐形，酒精能灭杀大批病毒。

Notice-If the infected people is over 400,000 or your life ♥  is out, you lose. If the No. of virus is 0, you save the world and win.
注意-如果感染人数超过40万或者生命♥用完，则失败，如果病毒数为0 ,你拯救了世界获得了胜利。
